entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of wet flurries inland overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 this evening then light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. 30 percent chance of wet flurries inland early in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
